extendedInfo.description: ESPN ScoreCenter brings you scores, news and standings from sports leagues around the world. The new app makes it easier than ever to follow your favorite teams anytime, anywhere. Stay up to date on the latest scores with personalized scoreboards and alerts. Follow the nationâs top stories with in-depth coverage and analysis.Features: â¢Personalized scoreboards, news, and video highlights from your favorite teams and leagues, highlighting the games you care about.â¢Expanded game views, providing in-depth game coverage.â¢Breaking news, scores, and videos from the top live events of the day.â¢Live scoring alerts for your favorite teams and personalized match-ups sent directly to your phone.â¢Live integrated Gamecasts, plus links to WatchESPN.â¢Calendar navigation, allowing access to previous scores and upcoming games.â¢Ability to share your favorite games, videos and news with friends.â¢MyNews & MyVideo present content related to your favorite team.

reviews.title: Used to work great. But now...
reviews.comment: The widget doesn\'t work at all on my S3. Please fix asap and I will raise rating back to 5 star.
reviews.author: Kevin Williams

reviews.title: Tablet version ok
reviews.comment: Suggestion to the Developer: MAKE THIS A FLOATING APP!! would be great for when I am on a game that does not allow one to see updates. Having its widget always on any screen would be a boon.
reviews.author: N. W. Dood

reviews.title: For MLB & NFL , Better than the rest !
reviews.comment: Best app for Baseball , love the strike zone & at bat batter info . Better than Yahoo, MLB & the all the others I\'ve tried over the years . I use the free version but will probably upgrade next yr .  Best app for football , from the graphics to the info at your fingertips , NFL app should pay attention !! Great job !
reviews.author: Tye Dye

reviews.title: No video widget!!!
reviews.comment: The one reason I use the app is for video. I had held off updating because of the bad reviews and I didn\'t feel the need. I finally updated just to find that the one way I use the app is gone. And the video quality on the videos in-app is worse too.  And to top if off, it always defaults to My Teams when I don\'t care about that. I just want The Lead but it always defaults to the other.  Wish I had never updated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget not working on Bionic
reviews.comment: The widget does not work on my bionic. It shows a loading circle once placed on the home screen but doesn\'t ever actually load.  Please fix! Otherwise, this app is one of the best for score updates.
reviews.author: Sean Tackett

reviews.title: Update brought it downhill.
reviews.comment: Used to be a good app, but since the last update, it is nothing but buggy.  The widget will only load on my, my brother\'s, and my friend\'s home screens ( galaxy s4, iPhone 4, and iPhone 5 respectively) after uninstalling and then reinstalling the app.  However, after about an hour, the widget will no longer update and won\'t recognize that a user is signed in, even though someone is.  So, you have to remove the widget to get it to work, but it won\'t go on home screen until you uninstall and then reinstall.
reviews.author: Phillip Friedman

reviews.title: Social?
reviews.comment: What with the Facebook log in? And now it doesn\'t shiw all comments and u cant scroll down? This app was great until the update, now its butt, please fix this app or u will lose a lot of users, these are not all the problems either! Fix this! Plz
reviews.author: Brice Maready

reviews.title: Please give vibrate option
reviews.comment: I hate that this app doesn\'t give an option to turn off vibrate when updates arrive. even when my notification sound is off, the vibrate always activates for a notification. It has woken me up multiple times, and im close to removing it from my phone.
reviews.author: Mike Krueger

reviews.title: No tennis notifications
reviews.comment: Update: Now no notifications at all. ----- No tennis notifications and no notifications by player for individual sports. For example, I want to be able to stay informed on Tiger Woods or Maria Sharapova.  I also wish you could set it to have notification intervals. I don\'t necessarily need every single Giants update but a summary at the end of the day or week would be great.
reviews.author: Nicole Franklin Cash

reviews.title: New update is literally garbage
reviews.comment: The new update made the app literally not work at all including the widget on my Motorola RAZR M. why isn\'t this fixed yet? It\'s been a while since the last update...
reviews.author: Noorhadi Shahrani

reviews.title: Drew
reviews.comment: This was one of my favorite apps. Keeps me ip to date with news ftom my favorite teams. Unfortunately I can\'t get my alerts. Please fix will rate 5 stars again.
reviews.author: Drew PopShellz

reviews.title: Still some glitches
reviews.comment: In the box score for individual NFL games, the Scoring Summary shows the teams backwards. Makes it look like the Chargers came back to beat the Texans. Fix!
reviews.author: Brendan Curran

reviews.title: Awful - Broken, horrific update , DON\'T DOWNLOAD.
reviews.comment: With one update this went from the best app on my phone to USELESS. After \"upgrading\" it turned ALL of my alerts off and when I try to turn them back on it just hangs on \"Loading.\" So now I get NO alerts except for the crappy yahoo! ones that give no details. Thanks a lot espn. If I could give this -stars, I would. Doesn\'t anyone test the app before it\'s published to the unsuspecting masses?
reviews.author: Matthew Wit

reviews.title: Sucks to force u to signup
reviews.comment: Why do I have to create an account to change my settings?  Sucks.  The older version was better.  I just want scores not an account or you taking my personal information.
reviews.author: Hoa Giang

reviews.title: Update makes better
reviews.comment: With the quick repair update, is now 4-stars. I do wish there was a way to place a stop to any notifications, is, nothing after say... 11pm.
reviews.author: Lloyd Daniels

reviews.title: Wtf.
reviews.comment: Can No longer get alerts from games. It\'s starting to make me want to removed this app. I do not want to have to go into the app and check my game scores and important news. Must fix. Worked fine BEFORE update.
reviews.author: Calvin Olsen

reviews.title: Help! My widget doesn\'t work anymore!
reviews.comment: I was going to check the scores and my widget wasn\'t working. It just continually tries to load. Omg!  How\'s a girl supposed to survive this tragedy! Ok so maybe I\'m overreacting but please fix it.
reviews.author: Cheryl Williams

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I used to be able to stay up to date on all of the college football games. Not just my teams. Think it is time to look for an app that shows everything I want to see.
reviews.author: Chris Thomas

reviews.title: Who approved this?
reviews.comment: Never alerts me when game is on, won\'t let me log in (so naturally it won\'t let me see scores), numerous other bugs now. Completely worthless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice update
reviews.comment: I would give it five stars but my widget isn\'t working. Just has a loading circle when I try to place the widget. Even tried reinstalling.  Please fix!
reviews.author: Benjamin D.
